### Quick Install
```bash
composer require maslosoft/gazebotest:"*"
```

<!--/header-->

######Gazebo Tests

This is only usable with maslosoft/gazebo package.

##Usage for testing Maslosoft Gazebo

Do not install this package, install Gazebo instead:

    git clone git@github.com:Maslosoft/Gazebo.git .
	composer install
	
Then for unix or git bash call
	
	run-tests
	
For windows command line call
	
	run-tests
